    <facet>

      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3271</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Lottery-Quiz and assignment rubric</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Lotterie-Quiz und Anweisung Rubrik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La rubrique de Loterie-Jeu et d'affectation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O rubric do Lottery-lottery-Quiz e da 
atribuição</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La rubrica di assegnazione e di Lottery-Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ρουμπρίκα αγορά-διαγωνισμοου γνώσεων και ανάθεσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La rúbrica del Loteri'a-Concurso y de la 
asignación</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This unit includes the short story, an interactive online quiz which tests for reading comprehension and an assessment rubric</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">short story</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Maßeinheit schließt die kurze Geschichte, 
einen interaktiven Onlinequiz ein, der auf Leseerfassen und eine 
Einschätzung Rubrik prüft</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette unité inclut l'histoire courte, un jeu en 
ligne interactif qui détermine la compréhension de lecture et une 
rubrique d'évaluation</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta unidade inclui a história curta, um quiz em 
linha interativo que teste para a compreensão da leitura e um rubric 
da avaliação</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa unità include la storia corta, un quiz in 
linea interattivo che esamina a comprensione della lettura ed a 
rubrica di valutazione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η μονάδα περιλαμβάνει τη σύντομη ιστορία, ένας 
διαλογικός σε απευθείας σύνδεση διαγωνισμός γνώσεων που δοκιμές 
για την κατανόηση ανάγνωσης και μια ρουμπρίκα αξιολόγησης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta unidad incluye la historia corta, un concurso
en línea interactivo que pruebe para la comprensión de la lectura y 
una rúbrica del gravamen</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
